name: grindDEX
description:
Rapid 2D arcade game for tough players!

Do you like hard games? Dodge spikes at fast super speed using a cool new "magnetic" control scheme. Scrape along the sides, hover through the middle, or squeeze by at the last millisecond by splitting in two!

grinDEX is pure high speed twitch gaming. Beat the world record.

How it works:
=============
1. Touch and hold left to slide left
2. Touch and hold right to slide right
3. Touch and hold left & right to split

Now avoid the tiny and big spikes!
If you like arcade, casual, flappy tiles, bird birdie tiles, don't tap the white black tile, dextris etc. games, you will LOVE grinDEX!

Download for free and enjoy our new game.
Visit http://www.orbitsoftware.de for more fun :)
